price: 4. B aye bazali kotelemisa losambo тре bazali kobimisa zakat(2) mpe bazali na tembe te тропа mokolo ya suka.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wayu'tūna al-zakata wahum bil-ākhirati hum yūqinūna
